title: How to post on linkedin daily?

pages.heading: Setup this repo locally
pages.description: Download this repo and run `npm install`.

pages.heading: Fill the template
pages.description: Update the user_input.json to add your content. Remember to select the background color as well.

pages.heading: Abra-ca-dabra
pages.description: Run `npm start` to generate pdf and post content. You can find it under the `output > <current_date>`.

pages.heading: And all set
pages.description: Verify the pdf and the content before posting. Add a couple of hashtags yourself as well.
